member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.LoadSettings
member.summary: Loads the settings for the defined Xml Settings File. Assumes names are not case sensitive
member.return: The function returns a boolean that shows if the file was successfully loaded.

member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.LoadSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the settings for the defined Xml Settings File. Assumes names are not case sensitive
member.param: The path to the XML settings file.
member.return: The function returns a boolean that shows if the file was successfully loaded.

member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.LoadSettings(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the settings for the defined Xml Settings File
member.param: The path to the XML settings file.
Case sensitive names if True. Non-case sensitive if false.

member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.SaveSettings
member.summary: Saves the settings for the defined Xml Settings File. Note that you must call LoadSettings to initialize the class prior to setting any values.
member.return: The function returns a boolean that shows if the file was successfully saved.

member.summary: Checks if a section is present in the settings file.
member.param: The name of the section to look for.
member.return: The function returns a boolean that shows if the section is present.

member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.GetParam(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: The function gets the name of the "value" attribute in section "sectionName".
member.param: Value to return if "sectionName" or "keyName" is missing.
Set to True if "sectionName" or "keyName" is missing. Returned ByRef.
member.return: The function returns the name of the "value" attribute as a String.

member.name: M:VennDiagramPlotter.XmlSettingsFileAccessor.GetParam(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: The function gets the name of the "value" attribute in section "sectionName".
member.param: Value to return if "sectionName" or "keyName" is missing.
Set to True if "sectionName" or "keyName" is missing. Returned ByRef.
member.return: The function returns boolean True if the "value" attribute is "true". Otherwise, returns boolean False.

member.return: The function returns the name of the "value" attribute as a Short. If "value" is "true" returns -1. If "value" is "false" returns 0.
